name: The Weather Guy
description:
Dear Weather Guy: The screen that displays the real temperatures is not working. But since you are an expert you don't really need it. Right? You will see the name of a city and you wil have to say the REAL temperature for that city IN REAL LIFE RIGHT AT THIS MOMENT.

By the way, we are live in 10 seconds.

Code and game design

Emilio Coppola https://coppolaemilio.com
